shouldAddCorrectBonusPointsForSpareFrame() - Method in class thmuggleton.model.impl.GameImplTest
Tests that bonus points are correctly added for a frame in which a spare was scored.

Tests that bonus points are correctly added for successive spares.

Tests that scores that do not result in bonus points are added correctly.
shouldAddScoresThatResultInBonusPointsCorrectly() - Method in class thmuggleton.model.impl.MatchImplTest
Tests that scores that result in bonus points are added correctly.
shouldAddUpToTheMaximumNumberOfPlayersThenThrowException() - Method in class thmuggleton.model.impl.MatchImplTest
Tests that the maximum number of players can be added, after which an exception should occur.
shouldClearModelAndViewForNewMatch(ActionEvent) - Method in class thmuggleton.controller.MatchControllerTest
Tests that the controller clears the model and view if no match is in progress and the user tries to create a new match.
shouldCorrectlyAddScoreForValidScoreAndValidPlayer(ActionEvent) - Method in class thmuggleton.controller.MatchControllerTest
Tests that the controller correctly adds a valid score.
shouldCorrectlyAddValidPlayer(ActionEvent) - Method in class thmuggleton.controller.MatchControllerTest
Tests that the match controller correctly adds a valid new player.
shouldCorrectlyExportScoreboardImageToPathWithInvalidExtension(ActionEvent, JFileChooser, BufferedImage, File, File, ImageIO) - Method in class thmuggleton.controller.IOControllerTest
Tests that the controller presents the user with a dialog box for file selection when exporting an image of the scoreboard and then writes the image to this file after the user inputs a filename with an invalid extension.

Tests that the controller presents the user with a dialog box for file selection when exporting an image of the scoreboard and then writes the image to this file after the user inputs a filename with no extension.

Tests that the controller displays an error dialog if model throws an exception when adding a new player.

Tests that the controller displays an error dialog if a score is added which violates the rules of a bowling match.

Tests that the main controller displays a dialog to the user indicating the match winners when it receives a state change event from the model and the match is finished.

Tests that the main controller terminates the application if the match is finished and the corresponding action event is received.
shouldNotAllowPlayersWithTheSameNameToBeAdded() - Method in class thmuggleton.model.impl.MatchImplTest
Tests that duplicate players cannot be added without resulting in an exception.
shouldNotClearMatchInProgressIfUserChoosesNoOption(ActionEvent, JOptionPane) - Method in class thmuggleton.controller.MatchControllerTest
Tests that the controller does not clear the model and view if a match is in progress and the user selects not to create a new match when prompted.
shouldNotExitIfMatchIsInProgressAndUserCancelsActionWhenExitIsCalled(ActionEvent, JOptionPane) - Method in class thmuggleton.controller.SystemControllerTest
Tests that the main controller does not terminate the application if the user chooses not to exit after prompting when the match is not finished and the corresponding action event is received.
shouldPromptBeforeExitIfMatchIsInProgressWhenExitIsCalled(ActionEvent, JOptionPane) - Method in class thmuggleton.controller.SystemControllerTest
Tests that the main controller prompts the user before terminating the application if the match is not finished and the corresponding action event is received.

Tests that the controller prompts the user before clearing the model and view if a match is in progress and the user tries to create a new match.
shouldRetrieveAndHighlightWinnersWhenModelStateChanges(ChangeEvent) - Method in class thmuggleton.controller.MatchControllerTest
Tests that the main controller retrieves the current leaders from the model and highlights these in the view when it receives a state change event from the model.
shouldReturnCorrectScoreForMaximumScoringGame() - Method in class thmuggleton.model.impl.GameImplTest
Tests that 10 strikes results in a maximum scoring game.

Tests that frame object returns correct total for a frame when a strike was scored.
shouldReturnCorrectWinnerForMatch() - Method in class thmuggleton.model.impl.MatchImplTest
Tests that total scores and the winner of a match are correctly returned.
shouldReturnCorrectWinnerForTiedMatch() - Method in class thmuggleton.model.impl.MatchImplTest
Tests that multiple winners are returned when final scores are tied.

Tests that regular scores are added correctly to the first frame.

Tests that the controller presents the user with a dialog box for file selection when exporting an image of the scoreboard and then takes no further action if the user presses 'Cancel'.
shouldThrowExceptionForBonusPointsOnNonFullScoringFrame() - Method in class thmuggleton.model.impl.FrameImplTest
Tests that an exception will be thrown if bonus points are set for a frame in which a strike or a spare was not scored.
shouldThrowExceptionForSecondBallOnStrikeFrame() - Method in class thmuggleton.model.impl.FrameImplTest
Tests that an exception will be thrown for second ball score set for a frame in which a strike was scored.

Tests that an exception is thrown if scores are added before any players are added.
